song_lyrics: Re Shyām tame sāchunāṇu, bīju sarve dukhḍāyak jāṇu...
Re tam vinā sukh sampat kahāve,
Ante emā kām koī nāve... re Shyām 1
Tethī mārī manvrutti aṭkī... re Shyām 2
Re joī joī man mohyu māru;
Dharādhan tam upar vāru... re Shyām 3
Muktānand man tam sang mohyu... re Shyām 4
title: Re Shyām tame sāchu nāṇu

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-184: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Leela Chintamani

Raag(s): Gurjari Todi
